name: SoldierNightmare
description:
This is an action game, the context is that you are a soldier that is having daily nightmares, and in them they appear soldier-enemies in a cementery fighting with him, but apart from that you will find some death skeletons, and zombies that will try to eat you, so what you have to do is defeat all your enemies, although remember that the monsters cannot be hurted, so you must avoid contact with them.

Are you able to help the soldier to overcome these nightmares?

Do you have fear? or Are you brave enough to try?

Great graphics, and amazing sound.

Have fun!
